name: Skane Lans Landsting
goal: Region Skåne is the regional authority of the southernmost county of Sweden. Region Skåne is responsible for health care, regional development of business, public transportations, climate and environment, culture and cooperation with other regions in Sweden and abroad. The highest decision making body of Region Skåne is the regional council, elected by the inhabitants of Skåne.
interests: Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Cohesion Policy, Structural Funds and EU-funding in general
- Research and Innovation Policy e.g. Horizon Programme and S3 Platforms
- The Clean Energy Package and deployment of Alternative Fuels Infrastructure Directive (DAFI)
- Transport policy including TEN-T and CEF regulations
- Health Care Policy including EIP AHA
